lead_paragraph: A consortium of major universities, using Homeland Security Department money, is developing software that would let the government monitor negative opinions of the United States overseas.

headline.main: Software Being Developed to Monitor Opinions of U.S.
headline.print_headline: Software Being Developed To Monitor Opinions of U.S.
